'''Adrift in the Harbor''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 3.6]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-05-02 18:00:00 &ndash; 2023-05-23 14:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Plenilune Gaze" [[Ganyu]] ({{Cryo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Empyrean Reflection" [[Kaveh]] ({{Dendro}}), "Golden Vow" [[Candace]] ({{Hydro}}), and "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
